title: Oscar winning composer of The Last Emperor score dies aged 71
description: Ryuichi Sakamoto, the Japanese musician and actor who composed for Hollywood hits such as The Last Emperor and The Revenant, has died aged 71.

title: Bomb blast in cafe after Russian pro-war blogger 'handed exploding statuette'
description: One person has died and at least 16 people have been injured in a blast in a cafe in St Petersburg, Russia.

title: 'Goodwill gesture' taken by Taliban as detained British men 'in contact' with families
description: British men being held by the Taliban in Afghanistan have been in contact with their relatives, a family spokesman has said.

title: French minister to appear on Playboy front cover
description: A French government minister will appear on the front cover of Playboy magazine.

title: Oscar winner ordered to hand back award after 'mistake' - but all wasn't as it seemed
description: An Oscar winner has revealed how her 11-year-old daughter pranked her with a letter demanding the return of her prestigious award.

title: Paris votes on whether to ban rental e-scooters
description: Paris is voting on whether to ban rental e-scooters across the city.

title: Media launch bid to allow cameras in court for Donald Trump hearing
description: A group of news organisations has launched a bid to allow cameras into court when Donald Trump makes an unprecedented appearance on Tuesday.

title: Deepest fish ever recorded revealed by scientists
description: Scientists have set a new record for the deepest fish ever caught on camera - as well as the deepest catch ever made.
